website_summaries.verdict: Offers value and quality — has a lot to offer at less cost than others on our shortlist.
pros: A basic, well-made set constructed of solid carbon steel
cons: The pieces don't come with lids, but this is a small concern

customer_reviews.title: Medium cookie sheet's surface peeling after only 2 uses
customer_reviews.text: The surface of the medium cooking sheet is peeling after only 2 uses, see my photo. It was hand washed and dried, never put in the dishwasher or cleaned with chemicals! I'm afraid all the pieces will start to peel if the cookie sheet's coating is this weak. You also can't return just one piece of the set, it's all or nothing. So it seems neither Chef Land or Amazon will help me unless I ship everything back, not very customer service friendly. Either I have one defective piece or the entire set is very low quality - time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Nice set but the small cookie sheet (which I use ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice set but the small cookie sheet (which I use the most) began to lose the surface after a couple months. Started with about 6 tiny round holes and eventually the entire surface became pock marked and would peel off and stick to food when used. Had to use steel wool to remove the surface to be able to use the pan without having the surface stick to the food.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey J.

customer_reviews.title: Treat yourself or your family baker.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is a natural born gourmet chef. She could not afford quality bakeware so I got these for her as a gift. Great quality without going to the local restaurant supply store and so much less expensive. They are worth every penny and then some. I wish I had found these sooner when she was still living nearby. Oh the baked goods I have missed I can only imagine.
customer_reviews.author: Randolph W. LievertzTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Finish coming off
customer_reviews.text: I have only hand washed my pans with wash cloth and the finish has already come off of one, have only had them a little over a month.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Best bakeware set
customer_reviews.text: These are the best bakeware set I have ever owned. I make French fries a lot, and usually have to add oil because they stick. Not in these pans! I also bake chicken and fish, no more need to grease the pans. I made chicken in one of my old pans along with one from this set. I had to soak my old pan, the one from this set cleaned right up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not durable. Coating comes off =toxic
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these for 2 years and they are unusable. The nonstick coating came off quickly and the pans bent with the heat from the oven. Would NOT recommend. Get something more durable or you’ll have to spend double the money like I have to.
customer_reviews.author: Moses F

customer_reviews.title: Theu work nicely and are easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these for about a month. Theu work nicely and are easy to clean. I just hand wash them (don't want to tempt fate in the dishwasher). I'm not a huge baker, and the set covers the basics of what I need in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: April Marshall

customer_reviews.title: ChefLand  10-Piece Non-Stick BakeWare Set, Oven Ready
customer_reviews.text: I love this set of Chef Land 10-Piece Non-Stick Bake ware Set, Oven Ready Love to bake pizza and muffins and roast chicken dinners
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Jonesjr

customer_reviews.title: Gift for My Daughter & Son-In-Law
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift and they loved it. They were by far the best value out there. What got me to buy them was the selection of pieces. I thought it covered the most useable needs for anyone. The price and quality was an extra bonus. Would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: D from Belgium

customer_reviews.title: Get your cooking on with this set!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good with these pans. I enjoy cooking and baking and really needed a new set. This comes with multiple different baking and roasting pans which I like. For the price they are good. Happy to have found this set.
customer_reviews.author: Cghost

customer_reviews.title: what a great deal
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves them, I love the cookies, pies, muffins
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light weight
customer_reviews.text: Good day, Not a ding, the set is not heavy, but everything cooks well, it's easy clean, is very Durable and yet not heavy. Price seems very good, I am trying to think of a negative. I don't have anything to say.
customer_reviews.author: TONY DERR

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: I used this bakeware to cook a kickass dish and impress a woman im talking to. Got laid. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Deerwester

customer_reviews.title: Medium cookie sheet instantly warped
customer_reviews.text: Bakeware is decent for the most part. The pizza pan, loaf pan, muffin tins and large cookie sheet all work quite well. I haven't yet used the roasting pan or crisper pan. However, the first time I used the medium cookie sheet, it had barely been in the 400F oven ten seconds before there was a loud BANG from inside. Lo and behold, the sheet had buckled horribly, and with enough force to not only dislodge a couple of the snickerdoodles I'd been making but to launch them clear off the cookie sheet and onto the oven rack. Won't be using that piece again.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: They are actually nonstick, not scratched.
customer_reviews.text: Good bake ware is hard to come by these days. I ordered these with great skepticism, when they arrived I was pleasantly pleased. They are not scratched, they are actually non stick bakeware, and I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn R.

customer_reviews.title: They're fine
customer_reviews.text: Ok pans. Nothing special, but they're alright. A couple of them were warped in an undamaged box. To replace them I would have had to send all of them back, so I opted to keep them. They're replacing my equally cheap Target set, so it's fine. If your looking for some functional, ok pans to do a lot of cooking on, these will do.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent starter set.
customer_reviews.text: This is perfectly nice for people who bake casually. It could be sturdier and some pieces were smaller than I expected (even after reading the specs), but I’m happy with it overall.
customer_reviews.author: ConwayJ18

customer_reviews.title: I’m sad that my pan curled on the first use.
customer_reviews.text: I used the small cookie sheet tonight for the first time in my new oven. On broil 550 degrees and only 8 minutes. The pan curled and it makes me oh so sad. I ensured before I put it in that the pans uphold up to 550 heat.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Azzara

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: So far I have used everything except the loaf pan. I have no complaints what so ever. They clean super easy. They do not stay hot too long after removed from the oven. None of my food has stuck. I've baked cookies, cakes, brownies, pot pies, pizzas, biscuits and breaded baked chicken. Everything has turned out perfect. Every pan I have used is still in brand new condition and I've been baking around the clock for a week!
customer_reviews.author: Tiara

customer_reviews.title: Just received
customer_reviews.text: We just received this so its a little early to give a great review. They shipped pretty fast, everything was in the box. Great deal for sure. I would say to take a chance on them....
customer_reviews.author: Margo M

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Non stick is great, cleans easily, baked goods are even and perfect. It does seem to sent easily, a bit of the non stick is coming off of one pan. Over all though, it's a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Henning

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for myself and they are great as long as you follow the one rule ... no metal utensils... use wood or plastic and they will last a long time
customer_reviews.author: Jason Buhr

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and everything needed for routine baking.
customer_reviews.text: Used as bridal shower gift for granddaughter ..we have had a lot of fun baking together over the years. Want her to enjoy with her family too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bakeware set. The pans are a good size, nonstick, and a easy weight to handle. The price was excellent and I hope to find a cookware set from this same maker.

customer_reviews.title: Feeling like a Chef!!!
customer_reviews.text: We've only used a couple pieces so far but, we're in love with these pans!!! Makes baking/cooking easy!

customer_reviews.title: Returned it
customer_reviews.text: Cant review it. Never opened the box and returned it

product_meta.title: ChefLand 10-Pc. Nonstick Bakeware Set |Premium Baking Sheets, Baking Pans, Roasting Pan, Pizza Pan, Crisper Pan, Cake Pans & More | Durable Carbon Steel Baking Set | Prime Housewarming & Wedding Gift
product_meta.description:
Kitchen Starter Kit For Every Aspiring Chef 

 If there is one kitchen set that allows one to cook, bake, roast, fry, sear, saute and grill; over fire, on a flame, with induction, electricity or gas, it is the Chefland Cookware Set. These trays are so versatile, you can use them to prepare popular food dishes as different as bacon, egg omelette, pancakes, turkey & chicken pieces, steak, bread and casseroles. 

 Add This Set To Your Holiday Gifting List: 

 Whether it is for a bridal shower, hostess appreciation, anniversary, wedding, or retirement celebration, present this collection to woo and delight your family and friends. Brides, coworkers, boyfriends, your new wife, hubby, mom, dad or grandmother – whoever enjoys well-cooked food, these pans are no-brainer, perfect gifts. 

 ChefLand 10-Piece Bakeware Set Includes:


 1 - Roasting Pan 14.75” x 10.75” x 2.75” 

 1 - Round Pizza Pan 12.75” x .75” 

 1 - Large Cookie Sheet 17” x 11.5” x .75” 

 1 - Medium Cookie Sheet 15” x 10” x .75 

 2 - Round Cake Pans 9” x 9” x 1.5” 

 1 - Square Cake Pan 9” x 9” x 1.75” 

 1 - Loaf Pan 10” x 5.75” x 2.25” 

 1 - Oven Crisper Pan 15.5” 13.25” x 1.25” 

 1 - 12-Cup Muffing Pan 14” x 10.75” x 1.5”
feature_bullets: REAL COOKING BAKING STARTER KIT – Chefland’s ten-piece bake-ware set includes the most popular pans needed to become a master chef. It is a basic starter kit and makes the perfect gift for an aspiring chef. It includes 1 crisper pan, 1 cupcake tray, 1 loaf pan, 1 small cookie sheet, 1 large cookie sheet, 1 round pizza pan, 2 round cake pans, 1 square pan, and 1 large roasting pan.

VERSATILITY IN BOTH SQUARE AND ROUND SHAPES – This variety of durable pans in various shapes and sizes pairs with gastronomic dishes across the culinary spectrum. Whether it is a muffin, a meatloaf, pizza, or a layered brookie pie, there’s a pan in here to pair with every dish out there. These pans are ideal for all kinds of cooking methods including cooking, baking, frying, roasting, sautéing, steaming, poaching, stir-frying, etc.

HEAVY-GUAGE CARBON STEEL COATED WITH A SAFE NON-STICK MATERIAL (PTFE) - Top quality carbon steel ensures that these baking supplies remain rust free while the nonstick coating allows food to slide on and off and eliminates the need for cooking spray. Unlike other nonstick cookware, Chefland’s exclusive bakeware are coated with a PTFE material that does not peel off with heavy use. The dark black color also improves the quality and speed of the baking process.

COMMERCIAL GRADE – Proper pans and utensils are what set a professional apart from the regular home chef. Unlike the bottom of disposable pans, the smooth metal base of these baking sheets results in a feast for the eyes and palate. In addition, each non-stick baking pan in this bulk set provides even heat distribution, helping your dish become a restaurant worthy delight. This collection is compatible with standard or convection ovens; heat-safe at high temperature up to 550˚F.

EASY TO USE - Each sheet is designed with extra-wide, easy to hold handles that offer an outstanding grip when transferring from oven to surface. After each use, wash with dishwashing soap and warm water or pop them into a dishwasher for fast and easy cleaning. Store in a cool dry place for long-term endurance.
